at line 15
static getAvailableUnits(string $locale = '')

Get the list of all the available units.

Parameters

string $locale The locale to use. If empty we'll use the default locale set in \Punic\Data

at line 52
static string getName(string $unit, string $width = 'short', string $locale = '')

Get the localized name of a unit.

Parameters

string $unit The unit identifier (eg 'duration/millisecond' or 'millisecond')
string $width The format name; it can be 'long' ('milliseconds'), 'short' (eg 'millisecs') or 'narrow' (eg 'msec')
string $locale The locale to use. If empty we'll use the default locale set in \Punic\Data

Return Value

string

Exceptions

ValueNotInList

at line 72
static string format(int|float|string $number, string $unit, string $width = 'short', string $locale = '')

Format a unit string.

Parameters

int|float|string $number The unit amount
string $unit The unit identifier (eg 'duration/millisecond' or 'millisecond')
string $width The format name; it can be 'long' (eg '3 milliseconds'), 'short' (eg '3 ms') or 'narrow' (eg '3ms'). You can also add a precision specifier ('long,2' or just '2')
string $locale The locale to use. If empty we'll use the default locale set in \Punic\Data

Return Value

string

Exceptions

ValueNotInList

at line 109
static array getMeasurementSystems(string $locale = '')

Retrieve the measurement systems and their localized names.

Parameters

string $locale The locale to use. If empty we'll use the default locale set in \Punic\Data

Return Value

array The array keys are the measurement system codes (eg 'metric', 'US', 'UK'), the values are the localized measurement system names (eg 'Metric', 'US', 'UK' for English)

at line 121
static string getMeasurementSystemFor(string $territoryCode)

Retrieve the measurement system for a specific territory.

Parameters

string $territoryCode The territory code (eg. 'US' for 'United States of America').

Return Value

string Return the measurement system code (eg: 'metric') for the specified territory. If $territoryCode is not valid we'll return an empty string.

at line 146
static array getCountriesWithMeasurementSystem(string $measurementSystem)

Returns the list of countries that use a specific measurement system.

Parameters

string $measurementSystem The measurement system identifier ('metric', 'US' or 'UK')

Return Value

array The list of country IDs that use the specified measurement system (if $measurementSystem is invalid you'll get an empty array)

at line 189
static string getPaperSizeFor(string $territoryCode)

Retrieve the standard paper size for a specific territory.

Parameters

string $territoryCode The territory code (eg. 'US' for 'United States of America').

Return Value

string Return the standard paper size (eg: 'A4' or 'US-Letter') for the specified territory. If $territoryCode is not valid we'll return an empty string.

at line 214
static array getCountriesWithPaperSize(string $paperSize)

Returns the list of countries that use a specific paper size by default.

Parameters

string $paperSize The paper size identifier ('A4' or 'US-Letter')

Return Value

array The list of country IDs that use the specified paper size (if $paperSize is invalid you'll get an empty array)
